remarks: Lemma for ~ dchrpt .  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 28-Apr-2016.)
statement:
dchrpt.g $e |- G = ( DChr ` N ) $.
dchrpt.z $e |- Z = ( Z/nZ ` N ) $.
dchrpt.d $e |- D = ( Base ` G ) $.
dchrpt.b $e |- B = ( Base ` Z ) $.
dchrpt.1 $e |- .1. = ( 1r ` Z ) $.
dchrpt.n $e |- ( ph -> N e. NN ) $.
dchrpt.n1 $e |- ( ph -> A =/= .1. ) $.
dchrpt.u $e |- U = ( Unit ` Z ) $.
dchrpt.h $e |- H = ( ( mulGrp ` Z ) |`s U ) $.
dchrpt.m $e |- .x. = ( .g ` H ) $.
dchrpt.s $e |- S = ( k e. dom W |-> ran ( n e. ZZ |-> ( n .x. ( W ` k ) ) ) ) $.
dchrpt.au $e |- ( ph -> A e. U ) $.
dchrpt.w $e |- ( ph -> W e. Word U ) $.
dchrpt.2 $e |- ( ph -> H dom DProd S ) $.
dchrpt.3 $e |- ( ph -> ( H DProd S ) = U ) $.
dchrptlem3 $p |- ( ph -> E. x e. D ( x ` A ) =/= 1 ) $.
$d .1. k n x $.
$d .x. k n x $.
$d A k n x $.
$d B x $.
$d D x $.
$d G x $.
$d H k n x $.
$d N x $.
$d S k n x $.
$d U x $.
$d W k n x $.
$d Z k n x $.
$d k n ph x $.
